metadata.title: Guilherme Gonzalez | Software Engineer
metadata.description: Software Engineer crafting responsive, intuitive, and visually compelling digital experiences with a passion for web technologies.

home.name: Guilherme Gonzalez
home.tagline: Building digital products across healthcare, finance, logistics, and more. Based in Brazil, working globally.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit about me and my journey

intro.p1: Hey, I'm Guilherme Gonzalez. Currently a Software Engineer based in Brazil, crafting intuitive, polished digital experiences with a focus on detail and user-centered design.
intro.p2: My key areas of work include React and Next.js on the front-end, and Express with MySQL on the back-end. I use Docker to keep environments clean and portable, and I've been diving into cloud ecosystems for edge deployments.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.p1: I started my career in IT in April 2018 as a Support Analyst, where I learned the fundamentals of troubleshooting and understanding user needs. After nearly 3 years, I transitioned fully to Software Engineering in 2021.
journey.p2: Since then, I've worked across multiple industries — healthcare, finance, consumer goods, energy, real estate, and logistics — building everything from mobile apps to complex microservices architectures.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.description: I consider myself a specialist in JavaScript/TypeScript and its ecosystem.

certifications.title: Certifications
items: Cloud Fundamentals, Administration and Solution Architect - FIAP
JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures - freeCodeCamp
Backend Development (Node, SQL, JavaScript, REST) - HackerRank

interests.title: Interests
interests.p1: Beyond work, I'm passionate about AI and LLMs, exploring how we can integrate them to improve our daily lives and build powerful tools.
interests.p2: I also enjoy strategy video games, experimenting in the kitchen, and occasionally writing about tech and personal experiences.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: A collection of professional projects I've worked on throughout my career.
experiences.noResults: No experiences match the selected filters.

projects.subtitle: Personal projects and SaaS applications I've built.
